page.title: 10WE BUILT IT OURSELVES
page.content: The Scouts,Cubs,Guides and Brownies in Sherston have twice raised enough money to{build themselves}an H.Q. Mr.Gordon Dyson,Scout Master & village school master initiated fund raising in 1950 for the erection of a wooden hut on rented ground.The building was finished in 1960 at the cost of Â£900. When the plot was required for other purposes a new fund raising project was started under the leadership of Mrs.D.Dyson.This time {several thousands}were needed for a brick building on a permanent site.The money came from many small events such as jumble sales and from{grants}from official sources.The building was started in 1980 & the{construction was {undertaken entirely by scouters,scouts {& well wishers.}The fully equipped hut was opened by Mrs.Dyson in 1984 & has since been used for many activities.
